title: Plans & Pricing
subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs and start your AI creation journey

items.question: How do I choose the right plan?
items.answer: If you're an individual user or just starting with AI creation, we recommend trying the Free plan first. If you need more features and higher usage limits, the Plus plan is a better choice.

items.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time. Downgrades will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

items.question: How are credits calculated?
items.answer: Credits are calculated based on the type and complexity of content you generate. Video generation consumes more credits, while image generation uses fewer credits.

items.question: What payment methods do you support?
items.answer: We support various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and more to ensure a secure and convenient payment experience.

items.question: Do you have a refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, you can request a full refund within 7 days of purchase.
